name: Dreamy Escape
description:
[NOT FINISHED YET / IN UNDER DEVELOPMENT]

If you play, please keep in mind it is still in under development and therefore might have some issues. Posting it in early-access for a school assessment. Thank you for your understanding ! ^-^

A game where a brave dog - who wishes to escape from the dreamworld - needs to figure out a path to his house to wake up. This puppy will need all of their mighty bark, strength (yummy chicken legs) and of course life energy (hearts) to jump off platforms and fight off monsters (what a pawsome warrior !) ~
